post.desc:
Yeah... with how proactive Kosuzu is, especially with running her very own book rental, I actually forgot that Kosuzu is a literal kid ‚Äì quite possibly about the same physical age as Aky≈´, and definitely younger than Reimu and Marisa.

ü§î Is Kosuzu already considered an adult by the village's standard? She doesn't go to school. In all likelihood, education like with Keine's terakoya probably doesn't go beyond primary/elementary.

Maybe, she does have friends from back when she's at school despite her interests, but they're all adults with responsibilities now, so they don't really hang out that much ‚Äì and Kosuzu herself prefers to stick with her books anyway. Might be an interesting story. Aky≈´ finding out about Kosuzu's own circle of villager friends.
